Name: Web Scraping Expert Needed to Extract Data from Website
Task:
Description:
We are looking for an experienced web scraper to extract specific data from a website and deliver it in a structured format (CSV, Excel, or Google Sheets). The ideal candidate should be skilled in web scraping techniques, proficient in Python (BeautifulSoup, Scrapy, or Selenium), and able to automate the process efficiently.

Project Requirements:
Scrape data from [insert website URL]
Extract fields including [list specific fields: e.g., company name, contact info, pricing, product details, etc.]
Deliver data in [CSV/Excel/Google Sheets/Database]
Ensure accuracy, deduplication, and proper formatting
Implement a script that can be re-run in the future if needed
Avoid bot detection and handle CAPTCHAs if necessary
Skills Required:
Web scraping (BeautifulSoup, Scrapy, Selenium, or Puppeteer)
Python or another scripting language
Data cleaning and processing
Handling dynamic websites and pagination
Additional Information:
Let us know if you have prior experience scraping similar websites
Please include examples of past scraping projects
Estimated turnaround time for this project
Looking forward to working with a skilled freelancer who can efficiently extract and organize the required data.

Name: B2B Lead Generation & Email List Specialist
Task:
Hello, and thank you for your interest in this job!

We are looking for a B2B lead generation specialist to help us build high-quality, verified contact lists for commercial clients. The task involves researching and compiling targeted business leads, including emails and phone numbers, with a focus on accuracy and compliance.
What We Expect from You:

Skills Required: Experience with B2B lead generation, email verification, data scraping, and tools like Apollo.io, ZoomInfo, and LinkedIn Sales Navigator.
Communication: We value clear, prompt communication and will be available for updates, feedback, and questions via Upwork messages, email, or scheduled check-ins.
Work Style: We prefer an organized, deadline-driven approach with regular progress updates. If the quality meets our expectations, this can turn into an ongoing partnership.

A sample lead list you‚Äôve built before (dummy data for confidentiality is fine).

Name: Lead Generation Specialist (Linkedin)
Task:

Name: Web Scraping Consultant/Developer needed for web scraping and data management
Task:
I am looking for a skilled web scraper to extract data from a specific website and store it locally for later query using keyword searches. The ideal candidate should have experience with web scraping tools and techniques, and formatting scraped data correctly both locally and with web hosting.  If you have a proven track record in web scraping and data management, I would love to hear from you.

-----------------------------------------

GOAL
Extract data from a specific public website and store it locally for me to access and query at my convenience. The website contains "Projects" and variables that can be indexed to each project. Each "Project" also has a varying number of PDF documents that can be downloaded. I want the PDF documents downloaded and converted to text so that I can run keyword searches, and have document names and their associated project returned to me.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Data indexing
Every project will have designations for:

Project name (example = D/2015/1134/C)
Address
Application
Description
Estimated cost
Lodged date
Decision
Decision data
Decision by

Every project will also have PDF documents. For each document I want:
Matching project name
Document title
Document text (I want all the text in a document converted into readable text that can be queried in the future)

Name: No-Code/Low-Code Chatbot with Automated Data Scraping for Swiss Clinics
Task:
Job Description:
We need to develop a chatbot for several private medical clinics in Switzerland. The chatbot should answer user questions about doctors (specialties, contact details, etc.). However, the relevant information is spread across multiple clinic websites with different structures, no sitemaps, and pagination (‚ÄúNext‚Äù buttons) that make automated crawling difficult. Our current no-code chatbot platform can‚Äôt properly scrape these sites.

What We‚Äôre Looking For:
	1.	Data Scraping/Extraction: A reliable way (preferably no-code/low-code or minimal coding) to gather all necessary data (doctors, specialties, contact info) from each clinic‚Äôs site.
	2.	Data Maintenance: A solution to keep this information updated in case the website content changes.
	3.	Chatbot Integration: Once the data is gathered, we want to integrate it into a user-friendly chatbot (embedded on a landing page) that can immediately respond with the right doctor/clinic info.

Scope & Requirements:
	‚Ä¢	We welcome suggestions for no-code SaaS tools or low-code scripts.
	‚Ä¢	The main challenge is dealing with complex site structures (no sitemap, multiple pagination levels).
	‚Ä¢	We want the chatbot to be easy for end-users to query and for us to maintain.

Please include in your proposal:
	‚Ä¢	Your suggested approach (tools, workflows, or platforms).
	‚Ä¢	Implementation plan and estimated timeline.
	‚Ä¢	Rough cost or pricing model.

Thank you! We look forward to finding the right expert to help us.
